message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product at a special price. I think you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'd be willing to pay $10000 for it.
I understand you think the product is pricey, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10000. I can meet you halfway at $13000, but that's my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to pay $11000 for the product.
I'm not willing to go as low as $11000, but I'm willing to make a slight concession. I can offer it to you for $12500, which is the lowest I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'd be willing to pay $9500 for the product.
